Alert Name: bush
Wolfowitz serene about probe of girlfriend
World Bank chief says he will cooperate with the review by an ethics committee investigation into the promotion and pay raise of a staff member he is dating.
04/11/07 05:18 PM, EDT
World Bank President Paul Wolfowitz said Wednesday he was comfortable with an ethics committee investigation into the promotion and salary increase of a staff member whom he is dating.
